sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"纵容，娇养"之意。
means: spoil ： 指纵容而造成对性情的扭曲。
indulge ： 指迁就或放任别人应该节制的欲望要求或感情。

sentence.Network_en: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine.
sentence.Network_cn: 她只是偶尔才喝杯红酒，让自己享受一下。

sentence.Network_en: You can indulge yourself without spending a fortune.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不必花大把钱就可以好好犒劳一下自己。

sentence.Network_en: They went into town to indulge in some serious shopping.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 纵字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 纵然〖 evenif;eventhough〗 纵容〖 indulge;pamper;connive;winkat〗 纵身〖 jump;leap〗.
骋字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同本义〖 gallop〗 放任,放纵〖 indulge〗 骋 chěng.
骋字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同本义〖 gallop〗 放任,放纵〖 indulge〗 骋 chěng.
沉字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 心情沉闷〖 besilent〗 沉迷〖 indulge;wallow〗 沉湎，沉湎于〖 begivento〗.

节假日来袭：10种方式教你一个... ... 7. Volunteer 当志愿者 8. Indulge yourself 犒劳自己 9. Random Act of Kindness 做点善事.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'treat with excessive kindness'): from Latin indulgere 'give free rein to'

entry.def: If you indulge in something or if you indulge yourself, you allow yourself to have or do something that you know you will enjoy.

example.ex: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine...
example.tran: 她只是偶尔才喝杯红酒,让自己享受一下。

example.ex: He returned to Britain so that he could indulge his passion for football...
example.tran: 他重返英国，为的是可以尽情释放自己对足球的激情。

entry.def: If you indulge someone, you let them have or do what they want, even if this is not good for them.

example.ex: He did not agree with indulging children.

auth_sentence.content: They sell drugs and indulge in other illegal activities.
auth_sentence.res_content: They sell drugs and indulge in other illegal activities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They sell drugs and indulge in other illegal activities.

auth_sentence.content: It is just a normal activity human indulge in.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is just a normal activity human indulge in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is just a normal activity human indulge in.

auth_sentence.content: Here's hoping they indulge themselves more next time around.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here's hoping they indulge themselves more next time around.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here's hoping they indulge themselves more next time around.

sentences.en: It is sometimes necessary to indulge a sick child.
sentences.cn: 迁就一个生病的小孩有时是必要的。

means.word_mean: 使（自己）沉溺于，满足（自己的欲望等）

sentences.en: He would indulge her every dream.
sentences.cn: 他会尽量满足她的每一个奇思妙想。

sentences.en: I wouldn't say he's a drinker but he indulged at the party last night.
sentences.cn: 我不能说他是个酒鬼, 可是昨晚的晚会上, 他却不加节制地狂饮。

jushi.english: He took out his cigar case, he had not indulged all night.
jushi.chinese: 他拿出他的雪茄烟盒来,他已整整一夜没抽了。

jushi.english: I wouldn't say he's a drinker but he indulged at the party last night.
jushi.chinese: 我不能说他是个酒鬼,可是昨晚的晚会上,他却不加节制地狂饮。
